title: Microscopic fungi
creator_credit: J.V. Durden, Tom Daly, Hugh O'Connor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A motion picture camera linked to a microscope uncovers a world of fascinating and colorful activity—the world of fungus growth. Highly magnified color cross-sections of vegetable substances attacked by various kinds of fungi give unusually clear illustrations of how these micro-organisms spread and reproduce, and also show their many useful functions.
